author: Pam Beesly
quote: You can't be scared of a room full of Jims. I love the guy but he's basically Gumby with hair.

author: Pam Beesly
quote: I planned a wedding with him. He wanted hot dogs.

author: Pam Beesly
quote: So everyone here knows pirate code?

author: Pam Beesly
quote: She could've left a while ago. Most printer sales are done over the phone, Ms. Boob-shirt.

author: Pam Beesly
quote: Yes, they're the only two gay guys I know. But they should be together.

author: Pam Beesly
quote: I used to love coming here. The chicken parm is good, big part of my childhood. Oh! Maybe Michael will start dating that too.
